name: BearsLair_TV
body: BearsLair_TV@BearslairT12 Oct 2022In 2017, Emilie McKinney wanted to make a jingle dress. She found that no one made them locally, so Émilie decided that she wanted to make locally made jingles. Learn her story:bearslairtv.com#BearsLairTV#BearsLair#SpiritofCoopetition#Indigenomics#aboriginal
